function.en: This truck can hold: 22 round bales, 18 square bales, 180 HP-bales, 18 1,4m Ultima, 18 1,5m Ultima, 10 pallets, 4 wood pallets, 12 big bales, 118 apple/chicken boxes, 102 milk/veg./rennet/bat., 39 butter/cheese/egg/trash, 82 geese/chicken feed. Max. wood log lenght: 8.5m
function.de: Dieser LKW fasst: 22 Rundballen, 18 Quaderballen, 180 HD-Ballen, 18 1,4m Ultima, 18 1,5m Ultima, 10 Paletten, 4 Holzpaletten, 12 BigBales, 118 Apfel-/Kükenkisten, 102 Milch/Gemüse/Lab/Batt., 39 Butter/Käse/Eier/Müll, 82 Hühner-/Gänsefutter. Max. Baumstamm Länge: 8,5m
